description:
For those who love to watch campfire magic. The FirePit+ provides 360-degree views of the blaze with next-to-no smoke, thanks to the airjets and mesh panels. The high-capacity battery improves the run times for longer evenings round the fire.

  • Stainless steel, enamel-coated steel, and glass-filled nylon
  • X-Ray Mesh side panels give 360° viewing of embers and burning wood
  • Includes FirePit, grill grate, fuel rack, and USB cord for internal battery charging
  • Internal 12,800mAh battery powers a fan for fuel burning efficiency
  • 4 fan speeds control the intensity of your flames
  • 51 airjets improve burning efficiency, resulting in less smoke than a conventional fire pit
  • Cooking grate is 18.5 x 46cm
  • 13cm foldable legs keep the unit off the ground in sensitive environments
  • Slide-out ash tray makes for easier clean-ups
  • Fan is compatible with Bluetooth app for control
name: BioLite FirePit+
